short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks specified websites by redirecting to a blocked page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is designed to help you enhance your productivity by blocking distracting websites, allowing you to concentrate and focus on your daily tasks. Whether you're working, studying, or simply trying to minimize digital distractions, this tool empowers you to take control of your time and stay on track. By preventing access to certain sites, it encourages a more disciplined approach to achieving your goals, helping you make the most of your day and lead a more balanced, focused life.
